project_cards.name: portfolio
project_cards.text:
This website is written from scratch in React with Redux. 

 There are minimal external module imports and libraries in this project and almost every function is written by me with JavaScript. Including hooks and modules like the full page scroll and in view effects. 

 Dive into the code if you'd like!

project_cards.name: concept
project_cards.text:
Completely accessible and responsive. 

 This website is written in clean best-practice HTML/CSS, fully accessible and compliant with every WCAG 2.1 guideline. It passes all tests for accesibility, screen readers, color-blindness and more. As required for websites by Norwegian law.

Take a closer look!
